dialogue.text: Hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii V!
How's my favorite girlfriend doing?
What do you wanna do today?/nEat ramen and only ramen, '''''tease''''' PurpleInsomnia about his back problems even though he doesn't GAF about it at all and ignores me.
Shilling Genshit to our teachers, ruin a friend group or be the most band kid pieces of shit in history?
no.
Ok then. I'll maybe just...show someone my private photos without their consent...no- scratch that- Talk about my fake boobs for 5 minutes on the bus. No wait- I'll sit on your lap again.
Do not do that.
Wha...V-V? What's gotten into you? I thought we were besties?
Common sense./nThat's what has gotten into me./nCommon sense that you are a shitty person and nobody fuckin' likes you. And, you're a pathalogical liar.
*Totally real tick that suddenly started just now! Yep I've just gotten ticks for some reason. Totally not because I'm craving 2 seconds of attention.*
Y-you're joking...right?/n(Pls don't be! I need ''friends''! I have no social awareness.)
No. Deadass.
Bu...but, we listen to cringey anime music together... :(
Pidgeon.
*coo coo coo*/n(PurpleInsomnia's note: This is a real person btw. Not even fucking exagerating here.)
You are THE stereotypical emo, anime stan, fake depressed loser. And you smell like ketchup with a side of fresh shit out of a dog's ass.
Dog collar wearing, 5'1 being, monotone singing, shoplifting doing, bragging to chicks that you wore big bras in 2nd grade doing, Racist being, extremely revealing clothes wearing, BITCH.
But...you restrained me from trauma dumping for the 139027428398th time when that hot girl in the mall exposed her parents...you said that it was '''inappropriate'' to do so...
Because it is inappropriate to trauma dump during a serious situation when you are NOT the center of attention.
Grrrrrrrrrr! I'm so mad now! I'm goinj to...idk...Trauma Dump!
No. You know what?
You should kill yourself...NOW!
